TopicTitle: Physics disabling plugin for sections of stations or large interplanetary ships

Articles.Content: Had a thought a week or two ago - it would be nice to disable physics for large sections of stations, to make them rigid, less laggy, and get rid of that horrible wobble to oblivion bug. Just select a few parts, and it removes collision physics and all the laggy or buggy stuff, and just forces the part(s) to have rigid and unbreakable joints. It would have some serious balance issues for launchers and such, but for stations or large, interplanetary ships it would be a GODSEND.

have you tried using KJR?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55657

Of course - but it does nothing for multi hundred part ships under 1 gee of thrust.

Sounds like you want the part welding mod: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/38577

There's an updated version for 0.24.2 somewhere in the thread.
